messages.title: Make sure your voice is heard.
messages.content: Help us to deliver opportunity for everyone.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib Dems will guarantee that the NHS budget rises every year with the schools budget.
The Lib Dems will end the scandal of mental health being treated as secondary to physical health.
The Lib Dems will cut Income Tax for workers by £400 a year to improve their cost of living.
The Lib Dems will finish balancing the books so that our children are not saddled with debt.
The Lib Dems will guarantee decent pension rises every year with our 'triple lock' guarantee.
The Lib Dems will bring back proper border controls and deport those who break the rules.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Locally, elections in Woking are always a close fight between the Lib Dems and Conservatives.

issues.economy: The Lib Dems will cut the Income Tax for workers by £400 a year to improve the cost of living.
issues.education: The Lib Dems will guarantee that the NHS budget rises every year with the schools budget.
issues.health: The Lib Dems will end the scandal of mental health being treated as secondary to physical health.
issues.immigration: The Lib Dems will bring back proper border controls and deport those who break the rules.

housing.content: The Lib Dems will finish balancing the books so that our children are not saddled with debt.

leaflet.personalStatement: To make sure your voice is heard, please find the enclosed application for a postal vote.
leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet contains a section on 'Postal voting explained' with details on how to apply for a postal vote.
